SEO_DESCRIPTION: Hi! I'm Carlos Gallaga, a passionate graphic designer specialized in UI/UX, and this is my digital portfolio. Here you can explore and discover more about my projects and skills.
HERO_INTRO_DESC: Welcome to my portfolio. Here you will find everything about me, my work and services, where each design represents a carefully elaborated solution.
ABOUT_DESC_1: Behind every design there is a designer with a vision. I'm Carlos Gallaga, a graphic designer passionate about UX/UI design, fueled by innovation and detail.
ABOUT_DESC_2: I seek to understand the needs and desires of my clients to create websites that not only reflect their identity and vision, but also generate meaningful connections with their users.
CONTACT_DESC: Do you have a project in mind? Would you like to work together? I'm here to listen, collaborate and create design solutions that make an impact.
